scripts.redeploy: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && sleep 5 && npx serverless deploy
scripts.generate-config: API_ID=$(awslocal apigateway get-rest-apis --query 'items[0].id' --output text) && echo "const CONFIG = { API_ID: '$API_ID', get API_BASE_URL() { return \`http://localhost:4566/restapis/\${this.API_ID}/dev/_user_request_\`; } };" > ./web/config.js
scripts.deploy-frontend-auto: npm run generate-config && npm run deploy-frontend-fixed-bucket
